title: Natural Language Processing, Crystals, the Individual, Meaning, Color Theory, Jordan Peterson

Knowledge Cascades and Crystal Formation
The Morality of Fundamental Physics by Nima Arkani Hamed
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CEjlWX_FfGg
The lecture on information, gravity, emergence by Dr. Erik Verlinde
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-OlEGq_g2FI&t=642s
Video of emergent crystals
https://cosmicpursuits.com/2527/emergent-crystals/
And here's Jordan Peterson on the Tower of Babel, both the video and the transcript.  If you don't have time for the whole thing, you can scroll down in the transcript and find the section on the Tower of Babel. https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/transcripts/biblical-series-viii/

Alex Booth's website:  http://cosymbolic.com
Karen Wong's website:  http://karenwongart.com
